name: Sutro Elementary ExCEL Program
description: LOCATION: Sutro Elementary School - 235 12th Avenue, San Francisco, CA 94118 The YMCA at Sutro Elementary School is an afterschool program for K-5th graders that believes in the importance of Youth Development. INFORMATION GRADES Participating: K- 5th - AFTERSCHOOL CARE: Monday - Friday 3:30 pm-6:30 pm REGISTER ONLINE Please contact Stephanie Brennan at sbrennan@ymcasf.org.
